# Supplementary File S1: An Excel file which includes benchmark DNA and RNA sequences for evaluating GraSSâ€™s performance.
# Supplementary File S2: An Excel file which contains compressed files generated by state-of-the-art and GraSS on ten benchmark DNA sequences.
# Supplementary File S3: An Excel file which includes compressed files produced by GraSS and cutting-edge methods on two benchmark RNA sequences.
# Supplementary File S4: An Excel file which contains compressed files generated by cutting-edge and GraSS methods on a DNA corpus consisting of fifteen benchmark sequences.
# Supplementary File S5: An Excel file which includes all benchmark sequence decompression times (s) by state-of-the-art algorithms.
# Supplementary File S6: An Excel file which includes the compression memory (MB) of all benchmark sequences using state-of-the-art techniques.
# Supplementary File S7: An Excel file which contains the decompression memory usage (MB) of all benchmark sequences using state-of-the-art algorithms.
